content: this is a summary of a legal text about a court case in ljubljana the plaintiff incurred costs of 261025 eur which the defendant is responsible for paying the legal procedure lasted for 1 year 9 months and 28 days from december 20 2012 to october 17 2014 the final resolution involves dividing goods between expartners including two real estate properties worth a total of 40000 eur the division will be equal with the plaintiff receiving half and the defendant receiving the other half the decision was based on the principles of the marriage family relations act and there were 51 translations available for reference
